def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_light_grey = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx) and is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_above_x = is_above(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_larger_x = is_larger(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_darker_bottom_x = is_darker(y, x, ctx) and y == get_bottom([x,y], ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_light_grey
            and check_y_above_x
            and check_y_larger_x
            and check_y_darker_bottom_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
